title: Example of the odd game people purport "always happens"

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
"noob teammates", "feeder teammates", "afk teammates". These excuses seem to be the go-to when justifying why you can't climb.

And then you'll get people telling you these games don't happen enough to actually prevent you from climbing, they're just minor setbacks - granted, fuckin' annoying ones. I agree. They don't happen enough for them to bring your win rate below 50% if you are half-decent.

These games come along once in rare while, but they're such a God-awful experience that they seem to last forever and they scar you for life. That may be why people say they "always happen" or that it is "every single game". It most definitely is not, but they are horrible enough to remember for awhile.

The Gnar... oh, God. Not many champs top lane out-trade Darius early. It's simply a matter of farming and staying the hell away from him. If Malphite can keep up in farm in early stage, so can Gnar. Not this dude though. Just simply garbo. I recommend adding him to dodge list.

Viktor. Just, yeah... don't be him and avoid him.

Sames goes for Xin.

The Braum died to us in the exact same way twice. No variation whatsoever.  He went all in on Jhin. Came close to turret. I separate Lucian and Braum, Braum goes into turret, locked down, dead. I recommend you add him to dodge list too.
